column4: hi everybody, i currently have a problem with i think udev not sure, it started when i upgrade to kernel 2.6.15.26 udev doesn't create my device example '/dev/null' doesn't exist @ boot, when i manually stop start udev everything works fine anybody got an id how this cane be solved?
upgrade that, it has a security hole!
